嵃字的基本解释

嵃
yǎn
山险峻的样子：“金墉郁其万雉，峻嵃峭以绳直。”

嵃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》魚蹇切，上獮，疑。］
(1)险峻貌。
(2)见“嵃”。

嵃字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵃； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页316第05
【廣韻】魚蹇切【集韻】語蹇切，?音讞。㟞嵃，山峻貌。【潘岳·西征賦】峻嵃峭以繩直。【註】嵃峭，高峻貌。又【郭璞·江賦】厓隒爲之泐嵃。【註】厓隒，岸也。泐嵃，猶巖崿也。　又【玉篇】殿臺之勢。　又【字彙】魚變切【正字通】宜殿切，?音彥。義同。

嵃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嵃字的起名意思

暂无。

嵃
Basic explanation of words
嵃
yǎn
The steep look of the mountain: "Jin Yong is full of pheasants, and the mountains are steep and straight with ropes."
嵃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" fish scorpion cut, upright, suspicious. ]
(1) Dangerous appearance.
(2) See "嵃".
嵃
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵃; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 316 05
[Guang Yun] Fish and fish cut [Ji Yun] The language is cut, and the sound is idiom.㟞嵃, the mountains are majestic. [Pan Yue·Xizheng Fu] Junxuan Qiao is straight with rope. [Note] Xiuqian, tall and stern appearance. Also【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Yi Yu is the source of the 泐嵃. [Note] Yapu, shore also. Luhui, Youyanying also.　[Jade articles] The power of the palace.　[Vocabulary] Fish change cut [Zhengzi Tong] Yidian cut,? Yin Yan. The same meaning.
嵃
